ObjectClass.Name: Vampire (Pharopod)
ObjectClass.Description:
VAMPIRE/PHAROPOD: Biological steatlh strike-bomber Very high damage against ground targets
Excellent raider and infantry counter
Progenerates adv. octo and sepi units Self-Cloaks and Heals; Mists to avoid death

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location \Move Speed: 7.2 (aircraft)\Vision Range: 30, Aggro Radius: 20 \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location\Attacking while Cloaked consumes Energy\[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 150, R 15, SR 2, Sta S\Air: 20, R 15, SR 2, Sta A

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: Set an Arcticus as commander or set\target's Arcticus as own commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Heirarchy
Objective.Details: Remove from command hierarchy\ \Disconnect from commander

Objective.Name: Lead group
Objective.Details: \Take lead of everyone that\reports to this unit's Arcticus

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\and return to idling

Objective.Name: Priority Cloaking On
Objective.Details: Enable cloaking until Energy is drained\ \Attacking when cloaked uses Energy\Cloak drains HP while Energy below 50%

Objective.Name: Priority Cloaking Off
Objective.Details: \Smart-manage cloaking to maintain \50% Energy reserve

Objective.Name: Factory/Progeneration
Objective.Details: Creates -pod- and -ligo-class units\when near another Pod-class\progenerator; when placed near\- Sepipod: progenerate Octo(-ligo) units\- Octopod: progenerate Sepi(-ligo) units

Objective.Name: Factory/Progeneration
Objective.Details: Creates -pod- and -ligo-class units\when near another Pod-class\progenerator; when placed near\- Sepipod: progenerate Octo(-ligo) units\- Octopod: progenerate Sepi(-ligo) units

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: \Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\Must upgrade Chronoporting\in Reaph building

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS\Recharges Shields 50%
